Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Dodge
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are still standing at Dempster-Skokie due to an obstruction at Dodge. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are still standing at Dempster-Skokie due to an obstruction at Dodge.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie buses.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Dempster-Skokie to Howard to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
